resources.string: There is no official information about the new features this update provides. Usually, such an update provides bug fixes, performance enhancements, and / or critical security updates for your device.

Since there was a download error, and the download must be restarted, you can use this link to download the update file from a browser instead. You might have to move the downloaded file from the \"Downloads\" directory to its parent directory. This is the same link the app uses to download, which is an official OnePlus OTA server link:\n%1$s
Couldn\'t retrieve latest update data information
Tap here to view important notices
You\'ve selected the \"%1$s\" update method. Enable advanced mode if you plan to switch to this update method.
Since you\'ve enabled advanced mode, you can download the latest ZIP for \"%1$s\". You can turn advanced mode off from settings.
Note: this changelog is for the latest available version (%1$s) in the \"%2$s\" update method
. If you intend to install this update, you must enable \"Advanced mode\" in settings.
Your system is up to date
The server can\'t be reached. Try refreshing the page.
Some features may not work properly.
There\'s an app update available (%1$s). Tap here to open the Play Store and update the app.
The app update has been downloaded
The app update could not be installed. Tap here to open the Play Store and update the app.
Please enable \"All files access\" for the app, which is used only for downloading OTA ZIPs to the topmost directory of internal storage
The downloaded update file is damaged! Please try downloading it again.
A server error occurred while downloading the update. Please try downloading the update again.
Unfortunately, a technical error occurred while downloading the update. Try downloading it again. If this keeps occurring, please contact the developer of this app for assistance.

It seems that the download link is invalid. This could either mean we made a mistake while adding update data, or OnePlus has pulled/removed the update file from their servers. A notification has been sent to the team, and we\'ll look into this ASAP. If you\'d like to know more, feel free to contact us either via email or on our Discord server.
The file has been downloaded, but couldn\'t be moved to the correct directory. Open a file manager, navigate to \"%1$s\" and manually move the file to the topmost directory of internal storage.
There is insufficient storage space available on your device to download the update. Please remove some files and try downloading it again.
Server error while downloading. Please restart the download.
Technical error while downloading. Restart the download or contact support.
File verification failed. Check your connection and try again.
Your download will now be verified…
Theme with a white background and OnePlus Red primary color
Muted OnePlus Red primary color, with an almost-black background. Use this theme to save battery, especially on AMOLED screens.
Use the system\'s night mode (you can set this either in Display settings or in developer options). Varies by device.
Switch between light and dark themes based on the time of the day, to prevent eye strain at night
Note: if the \"Auto\" theme is active and battery saver is enabled, dark theme will automatically be used regardless of time of day to conserve battery
Error saving your settings. Please go back and select your device / update method again.
Your settings are still being saved. If this takes too long: Check your network connection, exit the app and start it again.

"Normally, the app shows you updates based on your current OS version. With advanced mode, the latest available update will always be shown regardless of device/version compatibility.
This can be useful if you want to:"
"• Re-download the latest version even if you're already on it • Switch to a different update track"
"Advanced mode may be needed only in the above situations. You should not enable it unless you know what you're doing."

This app will allow you to:

• Get faster access to the latest Android updates for your OxygenOS powered device
• Easily update a rooted device
• View what's new in the system software you are currently using
• Read the latest news about OnePlus and OxygenOS

This is not an official OnePlus application. Usage of this app is completely at your own risk. Neither OnePlus nor the developer of the app are liable for your actions, including any damage caused by using this app. By using this app, you agree to the terms and conditions as stated above.
Your device is usually already selected above. If not, select your device above.

Usually, the incremental update is the right choice here, because it offers much faster and smaller downloads. However, it\'s not compatible with rooted devices. If you have a rooted device, choose the Full update. If you have a beta version of OxygenOS, choose (one of) the Open Beta update method(s).
Enjoy using this app! You can always change your settings later on.

• Press the Download button to start downloading the update.\n• The download progress will appear in the app, and as a notification in your notifications screen.\n• When the download has finished, you\'ll see a notification with the text \"Download complete\". If a download error occurred, open the app and try to download it again. If this doesn\'t work, make sure you have a working connection. Otherwise, contact the developer of the app. You can do this by visiting the \"My apps\" section of the Google Play Store.
Your device isn\'t supported, as it\'s a carrier-exclusive device
We haven\'t added support for your new device yet
Your device isn\'t supported, as it\'s not running OxygenOS

This app downloads official updates directly from OnePlus servers, and even verifies the integrity of the downloaded ZIP before allowing you to install. By doing so, the app allows you to skip the rollout queue and install official updates ASAP. If you encounter bugs in the OS, report them to OnePlus directly: https://forums.oneplus.com/feedback. You might want to join our Discord server as well, so that you can talk to other users about the latest updates. Otherwise feel free to email us at support@oxygenupdater.com with your suggestions/feedback.
If you\'d like to support us, you can either buy the ad-free unlock (app\'s settings), or check our Patreon page.

This app was originally developed by Arjan Vlek as a follow-up of another one of his apps, called Cyanogen Update Tracker (it provides similar functionality for Cyanogen OS users). After 4 years, in July 2019, Arjan decided to step down from both projects and transferred ownership of the app to a team of developers hailing from different countries. They took on the responsibility of providing the community with excellent service & support of getting OnePlus updates faster. You can find more information about the announcement here. 14th August 2019 marked the first release under new ownership, which came with new features like dark mode and a complete redesign. For more information on the team, check the website.

Please note, this is not an official OnePlus application.
The OnePlus name, the OnePlus Logo and OxygenOS are property of OnePlus.
Android, Google, Google Play and the Google Play logo are registered trademarks of Google Inc.
This app uses data from OnePlus and its parent company Oppo to show update information.
"Please allow the app to notify you of OTA updates, news, ongoing download status, and other important things. You can fine-tune your preferences later in the app's settings."
The %1$s is now supported. Open the app to choose this device.
Install or update Google Play services to enable push notifications.
Displays all non-important notifications of the Oxygen Updater app. Contains the status indicators shown during downloading.
Displays all important notifications of the Oxygen Updater app. These include system update notifications and breaking news notifications.
Notifications that reflect the current state of a download: pending, active, completed, or failed

Notifications that reflect the current state of a file verification task: in-progress, completed, or failed.\nMD5 checksums for downloaded files are verified to ensure the file hasn\'t been tampered with, and is a valid update file.
Get notified if an update was successfully installed or not
Get notified when there\'s a new update available for your selected device & update method
Get notified when we publish a news article
Get notified when the app adds support for a new device
General notifications that don\'t fit into other categories
Get notified when you\'ve submitted OTA URLs successfully to our team.\nYou can opt-out of automatically submitting URLs in the app\'s settings.
Failed to open article. Check your connection and press the \"Retry\" button to open the article.
You have %1$d unread news articles. Tap here to view them.
You have %1$d unread news articles. Tap to show all articles.
There aren\'t any articles available at this moment, check back later.

You've read all articles. Good job!
We hope you enjoyed reading our articles, and learnt something new from them.

Tap the banner again to show all news articles.

In order to give you the latest updates, we need to capture OTA ZIP URLs.

How can I help?

Oxygen Updater can automatically submit new OTA URLs to our admins. This will use a small amount of data and may use a bit of your battery. You'll need to grant root permission to the app, because it reads a database file that's accessible only via root. You will be notified when a URL has been successfully submitted.
I\'d like to help and agree to submit OTA URLs to our admins
Please grant storage & root permissions to help improve the app
Thanks for sharing OTA URLs with us!
This version of the app is outdated. It\'s time to update it! Tap on \"Google Play\" below. Within Google Play, tap on \"Update\".
Please wait. The server will be available very soon.
The server may be down for maintenance. Try again after some time, or report it to us either via email or on our Discord server.
You can\'t rate the app, because the Google Play Store is missing on your device.

You\'ve already downloaded this update, but haven\'t installed it yet. Tap on \"Install\" to view instructions on how to install this update. Tap on \"Delete\" to permanently delete the downloaded file. Press the back button, or tap outside to close this message.

It looks like you\'re using a carrier-exclusive device. Even though you\'re running OxygenOS, you won\'t be able to install updates. Carriers usually lock down the device so that users can\'t update or modify the firmware without permission from the carrier itself. This is a common practice in the USA: the \"Local Upgrade\" option is removed from carrier-exclusive versions of OxygenOS. This option is necessary to install updates by yourself, even if you don\'t use this app. Unfortunately, we can\'t do anything about this, as we\'re technically, and possibly, legally limited. Reach out to us via email or Discord for more clarity.

Congratulations on your new OnePlus device! Unfortunately, we haven\'t added support for this device yet. Don\'t worry though, we\'ll add it as soon as we can. We don\'t like making mistakes, and it\'s a time-consuming process to verify and test support for new devices, so please be patient. Email us or join our Discord server if you\'d like to help us, or to get notified when we release a new version of the app that includes support for your device.

It looks like your device is not running OxygenOS. Please note that you can only install system updates on devices running OxygenOS.\n\nOther devices, including OnePlus devices running Custom ROMs, are not supported.
It looks like you\'ve selected the wrong device: \"%1$s\", instead of \"%2$s\". Change your selection in the app\'s settings to ensure you receive updates and notifications for the correct device.
Your purchase is in the \"payment pending\" state. Once payment is completed, you\'ll be granted all benefits that you\'re entitled to.
The purchase of the ad-free version failed, because an internal error occurred. Please try again in a few minutes. If you have already paid, please contact Google Play support for assistance.
